channel.title: Comments on: MCTS Podcast 11: Dr. James White on apologetics and local church membership

item.title: By: Cam Prather
item.dc:creator: Cam Prather
item.description:
Thank you Dr. Barcellos for your series with Elder/Dr. White. This video, in particular, from your podcast series has struck me the most. From my own limited experience, the doctrine of the church is sooooo neglected. I pray the Lord will continue to bless His people through your "podcast" ministry.
Soli Deo gloria!
item.content:encoded:
Thank you Dr. Barcellos for your series with Elder/Dr. White. This video, in particular, from your podcast series has struck me the most. From my own limited experience, the doctrine of the church is sooooo neglected. I pray the Lord will continue to bless His people through your “podcast” ministry.

Soli Deo gloria!

item.title: By: Robert Briggs
item.dc:creator: Robert Briggs
item.description:
Good stuff, the church is indeed the pillar and ground of the truth !
Look forward to listening to Dr White's Polemics....when I make the time !!
item.content:encoded:
Good stuff, the church is indeed the pillar and ground of the truth !

Look forward to listening to Dr White’s Polemics….when I make the time !!
